channel.title: Choly Knight on Bucket's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Choly Knight on Bucket's Notes

item.title: my hero academia Izuku Midoriya
item.description: Pattern by Choly Knight I improvised on the pattern a little bit by adding the stick up hair in the seam between the face and the scalp. This gave me a bit of trouble with the head back pieces because I didn’t adapt them, I ended up making the scalp piece smaller and had trouble making the top of the head round. I considered giving him more hair but it took me 2 tries to get the shapes I got on the fringe so I was fed up and decided not to.
